description:
A VPN for Windows will improve your security while you’re connected to the internet on your PC. Enjoy more secure streaming, browsing, and work with NordVPN.

NordVPN encrypts your internet traffic and hides your IP and physical location. Works on 6 devices at once, on every major platform. With NordVPN, encrypt your online activity to protect your private data from hackers or snoopy advertisers. Enjoy global connectivity along with high-performance speed and secure access to streaming websites, censored content and social networks.
Threat Protection Pro™ has a new tool to keep you safer online:
* “Hijacked session alert” will let you know if your website login cookies show up in a stolen sessions database. It’s already on if your plan includes Threat Protection Pro™, keeping unwelcome guests out of your accounts.
VPN picked up a couple of handy updates:
* The “Pause” button got more time options — 5, 15, 30, or 60 minutes, or even 24 hours. Short break, long break, we’ve got all options covered.
* “Quick Connect” is now called “Secure my connection.” It’s the same one-click path to the best server, minus the name that may have left you wondering if “Slow Connect” was hiding somewhere.
